title: Kelly Rowland sets record straight after liking a comment slamming Ciara's topless shot with Russell Wilson and son Future
text:
Celebs Kelly Rowland sets record straight after liking a comment slamming Ciara's topless shot with Russell Wilson and son Future The former Destiny's Child star appeared to like an Instagram post criticising pregnant Ciara's topless shoot with her family Share The singer sets the record straight (Photo: Getty/instagram) Share Get celebs   Thank you for subscribing!   
Kelly Rowland has set the record straight after liking an Instagram comment that slammed Ciara's recent Harper's Bazaar shoot. 
On Tuesday, Ciara shared a series of candid shots from her latest photoshoot with the glossy magazine. 
In one snap, the pregnant singer, 31, is flaunting her huge belly as she cradles her two-year-old son Future who she has with her rapper ex. 
Her husband Russell Wilson is standing behind her while holding onto his wife’s belly with two hands. 
Underneath the image - which was met with a mixed reaction - someone wrote: "This is not a cute pic... sorry... it's no different than the one with the chick and her little boy... why must everyone prove a point by being in your bday suit." Instagram 
Kelly then liked the comment and a number of news outlets subsequently picked up on it. 
However, just a few hours later the singer took to Instagram to say she'd liked the post by accident and that she'd never criticise her close friend. 
She wrote: "This pic of my dear friend and her beautiful family makes my heart smile, I can't believe how anyone would actually think I would "like" a negative comment about a woman I look at as a great Mom, awesome wife, and a sweetheart of a friend! 
"Accidents do happen, and this new " ❤/like feature is WHACK." Instagram 
Ciara's post soon had people talking - while most people praised the “beautiful” picture in the comments section, others accused her of doing it to get back at her ex Future. 
One wrote: "Ok let me break it down for y'all if you ladies ex man had a wife who was pregnant would you think it be ok for your child to be in a picture naked with them and post it on social media is more my point would you be ok with that ladies." (Photo: Charlie Steffens/WENN) (Photo: PA) 
Another also said she was just trying to copy pregnant Beyonce, who recently showed off her bare belly in a series of stylish photographs. 
"This woman has issues," they fumed. "She is trying to get back at Future. She's nothing but a COPY CAT...BEYONCE WANNA BE. Best she has ever lived.” Ciara and ex Future (Photo: WireImage) Ciara (Photo: Rex Features)
